text: What is the primary data source for this project?
rationale: Understanding the data source helps determine ingestion requirements

text: What is the target variable or outcome you want to predict?
rationale: The target variable defines the prediction task

text: What is the expected deployment environment?
rationale: Deployment environment affects architecture decisions

text: . How do you define “success” for this use case? E.g., impact on business process – greater productivity or automation E.g., usability – easy of use for consumers E.g., reproducibility – ease of updating the solution in the future, or using it as an example for similar use cases E.g., Ability to monitor the solution effectively
rationale: Extracted from AI Analyst - Use Case Questionnaire TEMPLATE v02.docx.md

text: . What preliminary estimates do you have for delivering potential value? E.g., qualitative: “transformative process improvement” E.g., $100k cost savings, $1M revenue generation, decrease in time/FTE to complete a task by 50%
rationale: Extracted from AI Analyst - Use Case Questionnaire TEMPLATE v02.docx.md

rationale: Extracted from AI Analyst - Use Case Questionnaire TEMPLATE v02.docx.md

rationale: Extracted from AI Analyst - Use Case Questionnaire TEMPLATE v02.docx.md

rationale: Extracted from AI Analyst - Use Case Questionnaire TEMPLATE v02.docx.md

text: . How large is the entire source doc collection that  the application will be using? What’s the frequency for updates/additions? i.e. # of existing Articulate sites, frequency of new courses being added, and similarly for each file format required

text: . Success Definition
rationale: Extracted from Custom Application - Use Case Questionnaire TEMPLATE v01.docx.md

text: 1. How do you define “success” for this application? E.g., impact on business process – automation, cost savings, efficiency/productivity gains E.g., usability –: adoption rate, user engagement, ease of use E.g., reproducibility –  ability to update, re-use in future projects E.g. monitoring and/or governance - Ability to monitor the solution and govern the process and outcomes Scalability, security, functional completeness
